TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/CheckedListViewItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示在列表视图控件中已选中项的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of checked items in a list view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 选中项存储在控件中 。A stores the checked items in a control. 仅当 控件的属性设置为时，才能检查项 `true` 。Items can only be checked if the property of the control is set to `true`. 中存储的项 是包含在中的项 。The items stored in the are items contained in the . 类存储控件中显示的所有项 。The class stores all items displayed in the control. 下表显示了一个示例，说明如何 在示例控件中存储的项以及其选择状态 。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection states in an example control. |索引Index|ItemItem|ListView 中的选中状态Checked state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-----------------------------------| |00|Item1Item1|未选中Unchecked| |11|Item2Item2|已选中Checked| |22|Item3Item3|未选中Unchecked| |33|Tuple.item4Item4|已选中Checked| |44|Tuple.item5Item5|已选中Checked| 根据 上表中的示例，下表演示了 将如何显示。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|ListViewItemCollection 中的已检查项Checked item in ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|--------------------------------------------| |00|Item2Item2| |11|Tuple.item4Item4| |22|Tuple.item5Item5| 您可以使用此类的属性和方法来使用集合执行各种任务。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 使用 方法可以确定类中的项是否为的 成员 。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the . 一旦您知道该项位于集合中，就可以使用 方法来确定项在中的位置 。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the item in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够确定控件中选中项的数目 。This property enables you to determine the number of checked items in the control. 然后，可以在循环遍历集合的值时使用此值，并且需要提供多个迭代来执行循环。You can then use this value when looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的 属性对应于 中的项的键 。The property of a corresponds to the key for an item in a . 密钥比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果 `key` 参数为 `null` 或空字符串，则 返回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, returns -1. 如果 连续调用，最后返回的索引将首先检查键匹配项，如果没有匹配项，则从集合的开头开始搜索。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.

exception.span: 所有者 处于虚拟模式下。

span.span: The owner is in virtual mode.
